Interested in your own unique crest? Click here:‚Ä¶ | 17 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
What is the most interesting thing about the #135th #Canton #Fair? It is definitely this rideable suitcase. Although it is not our product, see many foreign friends buying it and riding a donkey around the exhibition,it is quite cool . I really want to run up, take our motor, and sell it to him! I wonder if the box can hold up if a 200-pound fat man rides on it? This store sells this product and it has always been very popular. In addition, I have another question, what kind of motor is used for this roller? You can take a guess together.

üöÄ The Power of LinkedIn for Dealers üåü Did you know that LinkedIn has experienced an incredible 41% growth in post activity over the last two years? This isn't your typical professional networking platform anymore; it's transformed into a hub of opportunity and connections. In the past, LinkedIn was primarily a place to showcase your resume and search for job opportunities. But today, it has evolved into a vibrant landscape where employers, including car dealers, are thriving. It's not just about job listings anymore‚Ä¶It‚Äôs about: üîó Community Engagement: LinkedIn is a dynamic space where you can engage with industry peers and customers, join conversations, and share insights that matter. üåê Networking & Connections: Connect with professionals, thought leaders, and potential business partners. Building relationships is a game-changer. üì∞ Stay Informed: Stay at the forefront of industry trends and news. LinkedIn is your daily source of industry insights. Ready to discuss the potential of LinkedIn for your dealership? Get in touch! We specialize in helping dealers leverage social channels, including LinkedIn, to their fullest extent. #LinkedIn #automotive #cardealers #socialmedia Mark Motors Group https://lnkd.in/dNkGeqhZ

At CON-LINQ, while we dream big about one day seeing our brand on a Formula 1 car, we're already in the fast lane, transforming logistics with the same precision and efficiency seen in F1's incredible logistics feats. Imagine the complexity of moving 1,540 tons of F1 equipment over 74,500 miles annually - a glimpse into the challenges our clients face daily. At CON-LINQ, we understand these intricacies. Our mission, much like the agility and timeliness behind F1 logistics, is to simplify freight forwarders‚Äô lives through digital innovation in procurement, quoting, and booking. Just as Formula 1 teams navigate the globe with extreme logistics, tackling challenges under tight, mission-critical conditions, CON-LINQ empowers freight forwarders digitally. Like an F1 car designed for high performance, our fLex platform is a multifunctional, reliable tool, ensuring operational excellence in the fast-paced world of freight forwarding. So, while we might not yet be on the F1 tracks, our spirit races alongside. Wishing a fantastic race weekend to all! I‚Äôm curious, do any of my fellow logistics professionals or F1 fans have stories or experiences in F1 logistics? Please share your insights and stories below :) https://lnkd.in/d5MbrsRe

ü§î Did you know that this year marks 75 years since Ferry Porsche realized his dream of a sports car? In 1948, together with his team, he built the Porsche 356 "No. 1" - the start of the legendary success story of the #Porsche brand. ü•≥ To celebrate the occasion, Drive Volkswagen Group Forum Berlin invites visitors to the "Driven by Dreams. 75 years of Porsche sports cars" #exhibition. This exhibition focuses on people who have shaped Porsche‚Äôs history. So, if you are in #Berlin and passionate about cars, this might be an attraction for you. ‚åö Entrance is free. Open daily from 10:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. until January 7th, 2024. Our colleague, Andreas Stanca, visited the exhibition last week, and he was impressed especially by these models: üîù 1 - Porsche Mission X 2 - Porsche Mission R 3 - Porsche 356 SL 4 - Porsche 914/6 5 - Porsche Vision 357 ‚úÖ You can find more information about the exhibition on the DRIVE website ‚û°Ô∏è https://lnkd.in/dmPkpfwm Also, if you are in Berlin or are planning a business trip to Berlin in the next period, we have some recommendations for places to visit during your free time: üî∏ Brandenburg Gate üî∏ Reichstag Building üî∏ Berlin Wall üî∏ Museum Island üî∏ Checkpoint Charlie üî∏ Charlottenburg Palace üî∏ Alexanderplatz üî∏ Berlin's Parks: such as Tiergarten or Treptower Park. What other cool places do you know in Berlin? Let us know in the comments. #noktostudios #visitberlin #businesstrips #porscheexhibition

COMPETITION TIME! It's December and Christmas is getting closer. We have 3 EXCLUSIVE PRIZES to give away! Welcome to our 12-days of Christmas quiz where you could grab a FREE BMW iX1 EV for 7 Days. That's right - a completely free electric car to drive for 7 days and nothing to pay. We also have two Luxury M&S Christmas Hampers to give away for 2nd and 3rd place winners! To be in with a chance of winning one of three prizes, correctly answer the question below. DAY 1 - What material is often used in the interior of the BMW i3 to enhance sustainability? a) Bamboo b) Leather c) Aluminium d) Plastic Comment your answer below to be in with a chance of winning! Each day we will be giving you another chance to enter with a brand new question! Head over to our Instagram and Facebook pages for more chances to enter too! To enter - follow EZOO, like this post, and comment your answer on each platform for 1 additional entry per day. Good Luck! Terms and Conditions: 1. 1 entry per day, per platform (LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook). 2. 3 x Winners will be randomly selected after the 12-day competition on the 13th December. 3. 1st prize is a 7-day all-inclusive subscription to a BMW iX1 EV. The winner will be contacted to arrange a collection date and time from Coventry which must be before 31st January 2024. Age 30+ only and 250 mile limit. Subject to DVLA License check with 6 points or less required. Drop off at Coventry is required upon return. Standard EZOO T&Cs apply, please check our website for full details: https://lnkd.in/e8_DmMft 4. 2nd and 3rd prizes will be contacted after the competition ends to arrange delivery. #EVCompetition #CarSubscription #12DaysOfChristmas

Test Drive a BYD Vehicle and stand a chance to WIN Goodwood Tickets! From now until the end of the 7th of July, test drive a BYD vehicle for your chance to win tickets to the Festival of Speed at Goodwood. Don‚Äôt miss out on this incredible opportunity! #Dunstable #Hereford #Kidlington #BYD #Goodwood #Hartwell Terms and Conditions Tickets are for Good Festival of Speed, 11 ‚Äì 14 July 2024. The winners will be contacted before the deadline on 9 July 2024. A draw with participating qualifying BYD test drives between 2 ‚Äì 7 July will be held. Only 1 entry per customer with one qualifying customer address. Hartwell will not be liable for travel or accommodation for the winner. Prizes are non-negotiable, non-transferable and non-refundable. No cash alternative is available. Prize offer may be withdrawn at any stage. No purchase necessary. Winners will not be required to pay to enter the competition with all entries to correctly identified on the BYD Halo Booking System. Entrants must be over 18 years old on the date of their entry with employees of the promoter and Hartwell not eligible to enter with all registered participants holding a UK bank account. Hartwell will not be held liable for any failure of receipt of entries. Hartwell takes no responsibility for any entries which are lost, delayed, illegible, corrupted, damaged, incomplete or otherwise invalid. In the event of unforeseen circumstances beyond Hartwell‚Äôs reasonable control, we reserve the right to cancel, terminate, modify or suspend the competition or these terms and conditions, either in whole or in part, with or without notice. The Promoter's decision is final. No correspondence will be entered into.
